title: Bug 21706 BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 version of SWT contains a line that uses Class.forName() to create a new Callback object.
EB: The usage of Class.forName() should be removed, and a private constructor should be added to the BidiUtil class.
SR:
1. Open the BidiUtil.java file.
2. Locate the line that initializes the Callback object using Class.forName().
3. Remove the usage of Class.forName() and directly create a new Callback object.
4. Add a private constructor to the BidiUtil class.
